Today is IS Day have Oral Communication lol but luckly no more table topic liaoz if not die ar.... Actually i like to talk but dun like to present in front of e class lol .... i can be v noisy n can b v quiet lol ... v noisy in front of my frenz n gf onli lol ... tiday my teacher tell me to do a good presentation for our final presentation cuz i miss a lesson ma then miss ten mark so muz wrk extra hard lol ... haiz bo bian .... the topic i chose is clonning lol ... hee ... my gf choose for me one leh ... actually she gimmi clonning n euthanasia lol ... then i chosse clonning bcoz i onli know tt topic ma .... haha startin i dunno wads euthanasia lol then she explain to me lol then i know .. haha .. me v stupid hor? haha ....

Oh bahaha well lets talk about my school & course. Well i'm studyin Ngee Ann Poly and i'm in multimedia computing. Basically all is about programing n more programing. I have a CSA teacher ,name - Connie Chan. CSA= Connie Sux Alot. Bahaha .... My Class. Very 'On' n noisy at times. Well consist of 19 student, 5 girls & 14 boys. We have one 'Sabo-ed' class rep. Simon. My best frenz in my class is Jeremy (Jiatlormee) lol. He's a super slacker lol , my downloadin machine ... hee to download anime n program. Simon my second best frenz, who is two yr older than me but have a young luk like us. Haha. We used to cheong CS or riochet(dunno how to spell) after school till quite late oso. Hee

Hi there ^_^ , welcome to my small n simple blog. Well it may not be nice enuff but hope u will enjoy it ^_^ . About me: Name:Wong Jun Jie Nickname: Xiao Bai Nian , Xiao Jie Age: 17 Statues:Attached Height: 175+cm Weight: 60kg Interest: ANIME !!!!! & gaming.

Yoz haha today is a tiring day lol ... went to work aft school at sim lim selling LEGAL games lol .... can say fun n tiring lol ... hee ... when i reached there one guy ask 4 my name then i told him lol then he ask if i hv any christian name or not then he say y not i give myself one lol ... then i tink n tink n tink finally i get myself a nick name call "Nick" bahaha v simple oso tk frm 'nickname' one lol ... haiz but dun call me Nick hor ... feel v stupid haha ... today i help them spy other shop to see price lol .... they call it "Marketing lol" .... stupid sia juz like last time my workin place oso lol ... bahaha ... hey anyone wanna buy game tell me i help u lol cheaper if i buy ma .... ^_^

Hmm today things went smoothly lol ... well IMMF de html finished n submitted liaoz then tutorial finished liaoz so no need go sat classs ... bahaha ... then psp slack e whole EXTRA lesson in e-garage.... v stupid n sian oso .... there was one whiteboard then me , heri , jermey n bun went to draw on it lol ... bun drew a landscape wit one sun n coconut tree ... i tink he onli know how to draw a coconut tree lol ... bahaha ... then heri drew a nice n cute stick man n jeremy drew a anime gal but i dun tink it luk like anime gal leh .. bahaha .... n finally i drew a shit under heri's cartoon bahaha n i drew a dragonball character but oso dun luk like haha ... well e-garage is a nice place to play cs n other game but seems like onli certain ppl wit pass can go leh ... well i oso dunno hee ... Aft sch i went to luk for my dear ... i was sweatin like shit coz hv to rush to c my dear lol .. hee if not lesser time to tok ma .... ^_^ ... well i teach my dear something related to our CSA leh .. bahaha ... it seems i grow clever than her for tt time being bahaha ... well haha but i tink my IQ n EQ lower than hers ba ... hee .. nvm but she still retard to me ... hehe ... hmm tts all 4 today gtg slp liaoz hahaha ... byeeeeeeee.e.e.e.e.e.e.e.e..e.e.e.e.e.e.e..e.e

urlLink By mIzAnDr3wlOtzZ Now i know i had it all Cause i had u Just to see u make me smile Why was i too blind to see thant i had everything, and u completed me? I can still remember how u held my hand Like u'd never let it go But now here i am alone, trying to move on Wondering how our love could go so wrong.. Will love come back to me Come back again to me When i still believe that u're the one i need Though i'm trying hard to make it through Living is so empty without u And i wonder must we go on this way U would catch my every fall U'd forgive all that u knew was wrong with me But i pushed it far away Too scared to call it love What i wouldn't give to have u back again Will love come back to me When love is just like u If it isn't u, i don't know what to do Know i gotta try and start again I don't wanna find somebody new Because i don't wanna go on this way And if someday, in some dream we meet again Baby do i have a chance to speak to u again? I know that if i were to say 'i love u' now. It's still to late Just to say the words, i'll tell u anyway Will love come back to me Come back again to me When i still believe that u're the one i need Though i'm trying hard to make it through Living is so empty without u Baby tell me do we have to live this way? Will love come back to me When love is just like u If it isn't u, i don't know what to do Know i gotta try and start again And the more i try and start again The more i miss you Baby, tell me somehow we'll find the way... Really hope that u'll realise how much i love u one day... Will always be waiting for u to come back.. no matter how long it's gonna take. urlLink

well juz came back frm work lol ... eatin instant noodle now lol ... well today v tired lol ... stand 4 the whole day leh .. kns .. then today can say pass v fast oso lol ... well i manage to sell alot warcraf III battle chest lol .. haha ..... lol so cheap $58 then get Two game n two guide book leh .... then i oso sell then i oso sell e lousy joystick n some games lol ... but no commission de so i oso slack haha ... today i had a lonely lunch alot lol .... hehe ... dun hv my dear pei wo leh ... hmmm ytd was too tired to write e blog so i tink i now write ytd things down ba ... well ytd was a quite slack n relax day coz Connie Chan tk leave so dun hv lesson ... yeah .. then aft IMMF me , jeremy , simon, Guo Qing, Jian Da n Yong Jia went to atrium to play cs lol ... then tt stupid heri was actually meet us aft class de but in e end turn up 3 hr later lol ... pig ar him ... then aft tt we went jeremy hse to slack lol .. heri do his immf html while me n jeremy playin D2 n he teach me play guitar lol .... i manage to learn some part of then Spanish Ballad lol ... haha ... my hand retard ma ... lol .. then aft tt we went attachment lol but we when to eat first instead of goin there straight even though we are runnin late lol ... we luckly e ppl turn up late oso ... hee .. it was quite fun as we can bat then softball liaoz .. well can say quite ez at first but as e speed of e balll increase ppl began to miss shot ... BUT i nv miss bahaha ...well there was one game we nearly get trashed but a other team but aft we change over i managed to catch hold of a flyin ball which coz e batter to get out of then game instantly ... then suddenly something happen ... everyone in my team started to cheer n run towards me as if i'm e hero like ttt .. .siao .. then i ask BUN y then he told me tt i save the ball they v happy bcoz it seems we are not totally trashed but then lol .. siao one leh ... aft attachment i rush to meet my dear lol ... well i was too tired so i did not have e mood to tink of wad to eat lol ... n made my dear tink for me ... sorry leh dear ... hmmm well aft tt i send her home then go home still my eat dinner bcoz my mum cooked me liaoz lol ... then i was too tired n fell asleep lol ....
